test_cauchy.pro

00001 FUNCTION f, x  
00002    RETURN, 1/(5 * x^3 + 6)  
00003 END
00004 
00005 pro test_cauchy
00006 
00007 ans = imsl_intFcn ( 'f', -1, 5, 0, /cauchy )
00008 PM, 'Computed Answer:', ans
00009 exact = ALOG(125/631.)/18  
00010 PM, 'Exact - Computed:', exact - ans
00011 stop
00012 end
